message.entry: CODE must be a Galois array.
N must be a real integer scalar equal to or larger than 3.
K must be a real positive integer scalar.
CODE must be a nonempty Galois array.
CODE must be either a N-element row vector or a matrix with N columns.
Symbols in CODE must all have 3 or more bits.
N and K must differ by a positive even integer.
The default generator polynomial should be marked by [].
Only strings and Galois vectors are allowed as optional parameters.
Illegal syntax. To specify GENPOLY, it must be provided as the third argument.
The parity position must only be set once.
Unknown option passed in.
The generator polynomial must be a Galois row vector.
The generator polynomial must be of degree (N-K).
The generator polynomial must be monic.
Values of CODE must be integers between 0 and N.
Values of CODE must be integers between 0 and N.
ERASURES must be a binary vector
The size of the ERASURES vector must match the size of the CODE vector
N must be between 3 and 65535.
N must not be greater than (2^CODE.m-1).
CODE and GENPOLY must be Galois arrays with the same prim_poly field.
CODE and GENPOLY must be Galois arrays with the same m field.
The generator polynomial must be the product\n(X+alpha^b)*(X+alpha^(b+1))*...*(X+alpha^(b+N-K-1)), where b is an integer.
Illegal syntax. No more than one Galois vector is allowed in the optional parameter list.
